channel.name: Query Iguana User Role/Email
channel.description:
This shows the usage of a module that can be used to see if a particular user has role as defined by an Iguana configuration and what their email address is.
This would be useful if you wanted to alter the course of a script like a web service based on a user name defined in the Iguana configuration file.

from_mapper.commit_comment: See if a user has a role.
